critique: The executive order emphasizes the importance of observing the Sabbath and avoiding vice and immorality. It invokes religious sentiment and appeals to the discipline and character of the national forces. The order aims to instill a sense of reverence and duty, while also acknowledging the distress of the time. It does not explicitly aim to evoke joy, sadness, anger, fear, disgust, or surprise. However, it subtly aims to instill joy, reduce sadness, and reduce disgust.
